Description: Primary container. One or more records. CRUD operations on data records. Input columns. Can be referenced by views.
Not reusable. Inherits parent root object. Created as widget in parent container PCF file.
Reusable. Takes root object. Filename ends with DV.
Horizontal bar containing buttons and widgets. Used on-top of or before panel. Provides edit buttons.
Pre-defined toolbar buttons for edit functionality.
